lead_paragraph: People are spending thousands of dollars to look better, believing that minor work will improve their careers and their self-image.

headline.print_headline: Noninvasive Cosmetic Surgery Delivers Confidence at a Cost
headline.main: Noninvasive Cosmetic Surgery Can Deliver Confidence, at a Cost

snippet: People are spending thousands of dollars to look better, believing that minor work will improve their careers and their self-image.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column observes that growing number of people are spending tens of thousands of dollars for elective noninvasive cosmetic surgical procedures; notes that many who have undergone such procedures, whether for their skin or for their teeth, say the money spent has led to benefits in their professional lives.
